jsonBody.data: {"inf":"POL01","c_id":957781,"cseq":2,"h_id":9972904,"type":"C","valid":"N","caseno":7483843110,"listno":"3rd","def_age":23,"def_dob":"13-07-1997","def_sex":"M","def_addr":{"line1":91,"line2":"Barbey Street","line3":"Sheffield"},"def_name":"Mann Carroll","def_type":"P","offences":{"offence":[{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.","sum":"On 01/01/2015 at Zogak, Cardiff, stole ROBOTS to the value of Â£987.00, belonging to Sutton Black.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Theft from a shop","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.","sum":"On 01/01/2016 at Sheffield assaulted Winters Decker by beating him.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Assault by beating","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.","sum":"On 05/09/2016 at Newcastle attempted to steal MOTORCYCLE to the value of 750.00, belonging to Martin Robles.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Attempt theft from the person of another","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.","sum":"On 05/09/2016 at Glasgow attempted to steal GAMES CONSOLES to the value of 750.00, belonging to Gomez Acevedo.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Attempt theft from the person of another","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"}]}}
